wild-eights.title: Wild Eights
wild-eights.blurb: Two player game! Play cards against a friend. Click the ? in-game to see the rules.
wild-eights.description: I started creating this game by forking my canvas game template into a new 2-player canvas game template. The server side of the game is a small Flask app.
wild-eights.tutorial: Based on a popular 'shedding card game' called Crazy Eights, but with only 1 round and no scoring. Exact rules can be found in-game by clicking the purple ? at the title screen.

breakout.title: Breakout
breakout.blurb: Bounce the ball to destroy bricks. Collect powerups!
breakout.description: This was my first JavaScript project. It started from a tutorial on MDN and I expanded it to add powerups and score-submission. I also made the ball bounce in a less predictable way, so the game is more interesting to play.
